about_the_game:
Necroflora is a strategy roguelike in which you manage a terrifying hydra plant, select strange mutations to wreck havoc on the land.

Bring the chaos

Create your own plant using an array of flowers with different powers and see how it evolves. Feed on the remains of your foes to grow more branches and seek out mana crystals to unlock powerful mutations. The 4 kings have multiple armies all across the lands, only a potent catastrophe could topple their power. Will your hydra grow enough to fill that role?

Mutate, Adapt, Overcome

Using all the tools at your disposal, bio-engineer your very own plant horror. Make it grow, freeze foes, create toxic clouds or even bring back the dead. Everything required for a good time.

  • 5 Plants, offering different starting points and different strategies

  • 10 Flowers, each with their own abilities

  • 30 Mutations to unlock and pick from to increase your hazardousness

  • 10 Foes aiming to get the honor of dealing the final blow to the mighty hydra

  • 10 Biomes to explore and revitalize

  • 4 Kings to topple

Open new horizons

Jump into the minimalist world of Necroflora and watch your hydra grow, offering laid back and relatively short but satisfying play sessions.

  • Analyze your run and all you and hydra accomplished with a full stats page at the end of each session

  • Destructible environments, break the means of production

  • Restore nature and color to the land with various plants in 64 colors

name: Necroflora
short_description: A new evil has taken root - you. Become the Necroflora, an ever-growing many-headed hydra, feed upon your enemies, acquire powerful mutations and defeat the 4 kings and their armies.
